name: places/ChIJy2PGLIVYwokRfgOhQ5Js5Us
formattedAddress: 44 W 85th St, New York, NY 10024, USA
adrFormatAddress: 44 W 85th St, New York, NY 10024-4510, USA

originalText.text: I'll start this review by saying I don't usually write them. In this case I felt compelled to do so given the exceptional experience I had with Tauber Properties. My family and I had the pleasure of living in two of their buildings on the Upper West Side over the last two plus years. Both places were well maintained and on the rare occasion that any repairs were needed the response was prompt and professional. Their online payment system while not fancy gets the job done allowing you to pay your rent using a credit/debit card (the monthly points haul was nice). That system also allows you to send messages regarding any issues that need to be addressed. My neighbors were also very kind and mostly quiet--perhaps a testament to Tauber's vetting process. While I've privately thanked them, I'll take this opportunity to once again thank Mike and Makeda--both extremely reasonable, attentive and kind.  If sometime in the future my family and I return to NYC, Tauber Properties will be the company I call first!

originalText.text:
If you want to lied to and ignored, please do move-in here. Otherwise stay clear.

My experience with Tauber Properties as a company and Makeda as a person was horrible. The communication was always problematic: she basically ignores emails and waits until you call her. Then she provides lame excuses: I haven't received your email, I have too much to do, etc. The move-in of a new tenant was delayed, although I specifically called and asked for the apartment to be prepared on time. Makeda lied to me that the new tenant wasn't interested in earlier move-in, which wasn't the case. They just could't clean it on time.

They also charged me the rent even after moving out. Right now I am waiting 2 weeks for a refund and still haven't received the check.

originalText.text:
DO NOT RENT FROM TAUBER PROPERTIES.
The other reviews here are not to be trusted/not real.

I lived at a Tauber property at 310 W 95th Street. The apartment was priced slightly below market, but had I known how terrible my experience with Mike Tauber, Makeda, and their full staff would be, I would not have moved in. I do not write reviews here, but feel it necessary to warn other potential tenants to avoid this utter scam.

Here's a short list of just some of my issues:
1) They delayed my move-in date because the apartment was not ready and did not remunerate me for it or offer me an alternative place to stay.
2) The unit had a busted radiator with a pipe that banged against/was breaking through the floor, which they refused to fix.
3) The kitchen sink was broken, which they refused to fix.
4) The fridge ended up breaking, which they refused to fix.
5) Dark brown water came out of the shower/bathtub despite daily use, which I complained about, and Tauber/the super refused to do anything, saying that was common for New York buildings. I hired a plumber and came to find out that there was a serious drainage issue needing fixing and that the water quality was dangerous.
6) The super, Dennis, would enter my apartment without consent; once he laid down mouse traps in my unit while I was out of town because I had apparently reported mice in the building -- I had not, but that was how I learned the building had mice.
7) Despite my keeping the apartment in perfect condition and never missing a rent payment, they have not returned my security deposit nearly a month after the 14-day deadline, and have gone radio silent (no response to email, calls, etc.). I will have to file a legal claim to retrieve it.

Other tenants have had similar issues with them as well.
DO NOT RENT FROM TAUBER PROPERTIES. Look elsewhere. It's not worth the ~$100/month below comparable offerings. Trust me.

originalText.text: I lived at one of their properties for three years. Great apartment.  Management was accommodating, helpful and understanding to personal situations.

text.text: I lived at one of their properties for three years. Great apartment.  Management was accommodating, helpful and understanding to personal situations.

originalText.text: I have nothing but high praise for everyone at Tauber (especially Makeda). They were extremely thorough, helpful, and fair over my past three years of being a tenant with them :)
